Articles.Content: I've heard that the vac co intakes float, but do the new structural intake parts?
Wouldn't it take less time to just go ahead and build something instead of waiting for an answer?

While it might be faster to build something, it's also nice that there's a forum where people can help each other. (Two way street and all that.)

Yes, all intakes (and nearly all parts) float. The new structural intakes seem to work well simply because of their shape. However, the old scoop intakes used to be the favorite because of how they are designed and how they attach.

Cheers,

~Claw
Danny has some fun with bouncy intakes on Youtube
